LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipEggLayerIntervalDays: Interval between each egg laying in days
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipEggLayerDaysToHatch: Time until the eggs hatch in days
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipEggLayerCountRangeMin: Minimum number of eggs per batch
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipEggLayerCountRangeMax: Maximum number of eggs per batch
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipEggLayerFertilizationCountM: Number of fertilizations per egg laying Multiple fertilizations will lead to multiple eggs being laid, I think...
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipEggLayerFemaleOnly: Allow males to lay eggs This setting only makes sense if the animal can lay unfertilized eggs, as males can never be fertilized
LanguageData.SY_CA.EggBodySizeMass: Egg mass set via body size
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipEggBodySizeMass:
Enabling this setting will set the mass of all eggs depending on the parent animal's body size: egg_mass = baseBodySize * mass_factor
Using chickens as default gives a factor of 0.5: mass_factor = egg_mass (0.15) / baseBodySize (0.3)
LanguageData.SY_CA.EggBodySizeNutrition: Egg nutrition set via body size
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipEggBodySizeNutrition:
Enabling this setting will set the nutrition of all eggs depending on the parent animal's body size: egg_nutrition = baseBodySize * nutrition_factor
Using chickens as default gives a factor of 0.8333333: nutrition_factor = egg_nutrition (0.25) / baseBodySize (0.3)
